questions.question: What is the goal of code review ?
answers: help improve the quality of the code and reduce bugs
strengthen the relationship between staff members
questions.correctAnswer: help improve the quality of the code and reduce bugs

questions.question: What are unit tests
answers: exams employees make before starting a new job
code tests made for individual units of source code
tests that the computer science faculty give to their students
questions.correctAnswer: code tests made for individual units of source code

questions.question: What is agile
answers: a programming methodology center around the idea of continuous  development
a programming methodology center around the idea of iterative development
questions.correctAnswer: code tests made for individual units of source code
